Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Joseph_Tobing
Reviews.Content: cautious booking hotel beginning review stolen guests properties discouraged book hotel option family vacation eventually found hotel distant main attraction forced impromptu booking eurostars st john day impression hotel nice nicely located walking distance colosseum palatine hill roman forum gary receptionist helpful moment checked throughout stay gary patiently answer queries relation maps tourist attraction supermarket restaurants bus station taxi booking complimentary bus tickets days tickets unused booked connecting nice furnished modern furniture shower clean beds comfortable dont staying 2 kids 7 4 luggage locked store valuables safety vault read security review hotel security hotel maintained notice security guard duty night reception wrong security system hotel breakfasts choices breakfast fruit bread continental breakfast quality food fine provide calories explore rome location situated manzoni metro station hotel save transportation costs colosseum roman forum 1015 minutes easy walk lazy easily bus 3 85 87 nearby bust stop 3 minutes walk manzoni metro station 5 minutes walk reach vatican city 25 minutes metro love bus 85 easily cover colosseum roman forum piazza venezia central museum fountain trevi spanish steps pantheon piazza novena piazza colonna bus hop hop bus love strategic location hotel missing kettle teacoffee facilities understand hotel italy dont provide kettle anyway restaurant hotel restaurants bars walking distance hotels chinese indian japanese restaurant example 5 minutes walk hotel finding foods plus hotel sport centre tennis swimming pool gym facilities literally door mean building hotel looks tough didnt time suggestion hotel please provide trash bin bin bathroom found insufficient happy hotel overall hotel service helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: NazA03
Reviews.Content: friend mine decided head rome 4 days looking pictures reviews price location etc chose stay eurostars st john overall pleased choice hotel staff friendly spoke english helpful clean european standards bathroom selling tub jets shower people getting ready bathroom breakfast delicious hotel 10 minutes walking colosseum perfect hopon hopoff bus tours sites city taxi food walking distance girls traveling safe hotel surrounding definitely recommend stay downside possibly person front desk hear street noise center door matter stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Nicely decorate and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: metonyc Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel modernly decorate looks 5 stars hotel walking 25 blocks metro station quick 10 min walk colosseum staff helpful directing speaks fluent english breakfast excellent sorts eggs meat pastries logging wifi able internet days bed harder hard overall excellent value

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in the great city of Rome.”
Reviews.Author: poppyD83
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights june 2011 reading tripadvisor reviews regarding stolen properties bit scared hotel found modern looking close sights affordable sooooo glad booked 1015mins walk colosseum forum 1 min metro station clean modern mention night shift remember name hes oriental helpful everyday night loads question regarding rome happy answer smile

Reviews.Title: “romantic rome”
Reviews.Author: ronaldvictor
Reviews.Content: saint johns rome located quiet street night daytime located school didnt bad feeling breakfast excellent jacuzzi bathroom pleasant relaxing restaurant hotel services cleaning ok pricequality ok

Reviews.Title: “Hmm...”
Reviews.Author: Beks6
Reviews.Content: actually april 2010 airport theres evenings hotel street nice looking wasnt huge nice clean lovely bathroom bar restaurant staff werent particularly helpful couldnt iron due apparently health safety reasons recommended laundry service ironed clothes road pay didnt pay iron clothes ac didnt didnt hot night difficult sleep window hotel walking distance colleseum palatine hills fountains etc metro ride vatican city wasnt bad immediate vicinity indian restaurant suprised sick night start

Reviews.Title: “Nice Clean Hotel, good service, great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: AdvocatusDiaboliAU
Reviews.Content: clean tidy service staff friendly helpful spoke english close manzoni metro station fair else breakfast fantastic 35 daughter allowed eat table free happy hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good option for a short stay..”
Reviews.Author: Jules24London
Reviews.Content: staff friendly accommodating close metro station close main attractions breakfast slightly disappointing despite cost €12 served cappuccino coffee machine definitely expects traveling italy narrow bed comfortable sum couple days city

Reviews.Title: “We wanted to change hotels within an hour of checking in”
Reviews.Author: wallamercedes
Reviews.Content: definitely recommend hotel friend hotel front desk staff snobby rude unhelpful hotel nice inside clean clean decorated nicely bed pillows comfortable housekeeping service excellent reasons chose hotel free wifi horrible dodgy internet reception username password arrival specifically wifi expect able sort business communication online hotel moved internet reception told hotel completely true checked midweek hardly guests stay overall am leaving bad taste mouth definitely stay

Reviews.Content: items stolen hotel night 14 july brand camera bought airport mobile phone left charging dinner weren’t safe valuables evening couple laptop wouldn’t fitted safe looking tripadvisor people stolen july 2010 review english spanish similar incidents 2009 thefts bags stored reception leads conclude hotel serious ongoing security manager fairly helpful reported theft didn’t accompany police station couple assuring spoke english didn’t resulting stressful couple hours police station – ideal spend morning holiday proof purchase camera phone money hotel’s insurance legally obliged provide according italian civil code despite providing promptly heard return uk emails expensive phone calls gone unanswered frustrating reception staff incredibly unsympathetic rude unhelpful women duty claimed understand english pretty weren’t manager actually standing front talking couple stolen laptop reaction happened staring time speak manager phone free charge short call insurance company mobile internet access proof purchase phone emailed mobile communicated reception staff argument women using internet minutes enter hotel left reception thief wouldn’t walk past reception secure bags stored safes fiddly entry forced – managed copy electric key cards access spares hadn’t experience pleased hotel price lastminute secret hotels deal fairly comfortable fresh decoration there’s noise mornings playground hotel walls thin neighbours weren’t late wasn’t aren’t shops restaurants it’s 15 minute walk colosseum couple minutes manzoni station red line it’s fairly quick trevi fountain spanish steps getting trastevere dinner bit pain can’t tube – it’s walkable takes hour repeated security experience attitude staff recommend staying

Reviews.Title: “After bad reviews we were pleasently suprised!!”
Reviews.Author: starsky357
Reviews.Content: stayed night suprise 40th rome kings convenience parco della fantastic booked via lastminutes 4 star secret hotel reading pretty bad reviews little expectation honest staf helpful modern bathrooms isnt romantic 200 hotel location functional hotel fine ive rome time found amazing probably decided try strolled couple lazy enjoyed atmosphere truly time

Reviews.Title: “staff Robbed €150, Manager would not discuss”
Reviews.Author: petermadden
Reviews.Content: stayed july nights teenage sons eldest son left wallet dressing table holiday money returned wallet money gone contacted manager wife stayed reception 3 hours manager returned passed lunch rang 3 times manager curtesy reply withstanding receptionist promised expect manager keen feedback especially money stolen hotel average star average

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and an easy walk to the Coloseum”
Reviews.Author: BradnMarianne
Reviews.Content: comfortable little clean situated colosseum access metro station 250m walk location quiet bit active 10 minutes walk colosseum flat easy buffet breakfast provided

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Ponora
Reviews.Content: hotel location excellent 10 minute walk colosseum attractions vatican easily accessible bus metro stayed exceptionally clean tidy equipped air conditioning satellite tv minibar ensuite bathroom downside size wasnt spent day siteseeing anyway breakfast buffet provided dining wide range hot cold options available staff reception friendly welcoming hotel looked modern stylish enjoyed stay recommend hotel plans siteseeing trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Staff tried to rip us off”
Reviews.Author: Xlin
Reviews.Content: ive stayed rome times hotel prices indicate nice bit luxurious hotel space move dont feel saying hotel self biggest staff huge lack service tried rip taking fees 50 euros normaly costs 250 euros ive lived rome couple terrible service dont

Reviews.Content: stayed prime st john 3 nights leg honeymoon italy booked brendan vacations awful digress arrived hotel appeared modern clean beaten path check pablo probably concierges unbelievably rude walked personal phone call stayed call 10 minutes stood waiting checked told late 500pm tired moving slowly size walk closet clean twin beds pushed norm europe window tv wall switch language english closet bathroom blended wall moment didn’t drawers basically lived suitcases bathroom clean extremely tiny norm europe air conditioner ran wake calls delivered time paid 350 euros night barely walk ate breakfast subpar runny eggs undercooked bacon ripe fruit awful coffee location 1015 minutes coliseum didn’t attempt walk vatican cab hop hop bus tour numerous restaurants merulana street corner hotel main complaints size awful service concierges simple questions recommendations restaurant forth travel agent documents check conclusion tons hotels stay rome someplace else save money treated nicely vacation lifetime

Reviews.Title: “No Air Conditioning and rude staff...”
Reviews.Author: Gustradamus
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights air conditioning unbearable heat rome stint weather arrived warm hotel overlooks busy street window air couldnt sleep due noise arrived realised brought attention hotel staff complaints fell deaf ears 4 days irritating wide array excused received told law italy air conditioning 1 april excuse quashed arrived hotel florence 30 march air conditioning fine round eventually told broken day requested fan told didnt exactly expect star hotel day eventually managed fan countless complaints consistently brought attention air conditioning advertised didnt care aside air conditioning wifi didnt staff knowledgeable rome completely unhelpful requests didnt ironironing board hundreds hotels rome nicer staff locations air conditioning rome city nights sleep enjoyed else

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Location with nice contemporary rooms”
Reviews.Author: SAIFAY
Reviews.Content: hotel 2 min walk metro line station central rome 10 mins 10 min walk colloseum tidy clean breakfast included food prices rome night concierge helpful friendly def stay

Reviews.Title: “Four Star...? Really?”
Reviews.Author: SRRVancouver
Reviews.Content: husband stayed prime hotel saint john february 2010 nights fairly low maintenance people fair bit traveling rarely negative stay five star star accommodation honestly prime hotel saint john worst hotel experiences weve begin road requiring internet access choose hotels internet hotel charges internet days called inquire internet deadline starting worry told weather hung internet cafe computer stars million little added incredibly rude unhelpful staff ok thats glassware changed incredibly loud hot slept window wide february star hotel lot wouldnt bugged star hotel dont care star rating rude staff acceptable bottom line dont stay
